title: camera vibration augmentation
body:
Hello
How are you?
Thanks for contributing to this project.
I have a question.
Does this library contain a camera motion augmentation?
Here the camera motion means a camera's vibration(shaking).

![00000](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47862419/145049173-1dff9f3f-76a7-46f5-84db-9fa66d12f2e5.jpg)
![00001](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47862419/145049186-ccaabe92-7be4-4482-9f42-2ce9dd3b5191.jpg)
![00002](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47862419/145049191-61d80934-9791-4931-9555-cb9c2ef65177.jpg)
![00003](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47862419/145049197-4db93aba-dd79-41ed-aa31-bfc332d09e04.jpg)
![00004](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47862419/145049204-4d34fb27-215b-4632-ac45-672ec317d134.jpg)
![00005](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47862419/145049212-2fcdfc8c-f18d-44c1-90c1-f285423aa190.jpg)
![00006](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47862419/145049220-5fa5b8b8-de0b-4109-bb7e-b6520f428a85.jpg)

Please check the above sequence frames which are shaking by camera vibration.
Could u implement this augmentation in your repo?
Thanks
